pkgmetadata.longdescription: Ecological Inference of RxC Tables by Latent Structure Approaches // Estimates RxC (R by C) vote transfer matrices (ecological contingency tables) from aggregate data building on Thomsen (1987) and Park (2008) approaches. References: Park, W.-H. (2008). ''Ecological Inference and Aggregate Analysis of Election''. PhD Dissertation. University of Michigan. https://d eepblue.lib.umich.edu/bitstream/handle/2027.42/58525/wpark_1.pd f Thomsen, S.R. (1987, ISBN:87-7335-037-2). ''Danish Elections 1920 79: a Logit Approach to Ecological Analysis and Inference''. Politica, Aarhus, Denmark.
